roleset.name: partitive-quant, round of something

example.name: Another example with arg 1
example.text: its first wave of sales of big , sick thrifts
example.arg: of sales of big , sick thrifts

example.name: Example with temporal
example.text: This current wave of anti-Syrian attitudes

roleset.note: No corresponding Verbnet class. Framenet class quantity. Framed by Katie

roleset.name: Cause ripples or unease

example.name: make waves
example.text: He last made waves when he dared to defend an Indian girl who had been adopted by non-Indian parents off her reservation .

roleset.note: Roleset based on agitate.01. Verbnet class amuse 31.1. Framed by Katie

roleset.name: trend

example.name: autogen1
example.text: Is Wal-Mart's way the wave of the future?

roleset.note: Roleset based on trend.01. No corresponding Verbnet class. Framed by Katie.

predicate.note: Differs from wave.01 because the theme does not come in many cycles. For example you may have many waves 'of sales', where sales are stronger, weaker, and stronger again (wave.01), but you will not have many waves 'of the future' (wave.03)
